properties.description: Returns true if the object specifier resolves to valid objects.
properties.name: isValid

properties.description: The parent of the FindChangeInnerGlowSetting (a FindChangeTransparencySetting, FindChangeStrokeTransparencySetting, FindChangeFillTransparencySetting or FindChangeContentTransparencySetting).
properties.name: parent

properties.description: If true, the inner glow effect is applied. Can return: Boolean or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: applied

properties.description: The blending mode for the inner glow effect. Can return: BlendMode enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: blendMode

properties.description: The opacity of the inner glow (as a percentage). (Range: 0 to 100). Can return: Real (0 - 100) or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: opacity

properties.description: The amount (as a percentage) of noise applied to the inner glow. (Range: 0 to 100). Can return: Real (0 - 100) or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: noise

properties.description: The color applied to the inner glow, specified as a swatch (color, gradient, tint, or mixed ink), or as an array of color values. The color mode dictates the array values: for RGB, specify three values, each in the range 0 to 255, in the format [R,G,B]; for CMYK, specify four values, each as a percentage and each in the range 0 to 100, in the format [C,M,Y,K]; for LAB, specify three values in the format [L,A,B], with L in the range 0 to 100 and A and B in the range -128 to 127. Can return: Swatch or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: effectColor

properties.description: The technique used for the inner glow. Can return: GlowTechnique enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: technique

properties.description: The amount of spread (as a percentage of the inner glow size). (Range: 0 to 100). Can return: Real (0 - 100) or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: spread

properties.description: The size of the inner glow. Can return: Unit (0 - 144 points) or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: size

properties.description: The light source of the inner glow effect. Can return: InnerGlowSource enumerator or NothingEnum enumerator.
properties.name: source

properties.description: A property that allows setting of several properties at the same time.
properties.name: properties

methods.description: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the FindChangeInnerGlowSetting.
methods.name: toSource

methods.description: Resolves the object specifier, creating an array of object references.
methods.name: getElements

parameters.description: The event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler

parameters.description: The registered event handler. Can accept: File or JavaScript Function.
parameters.name: handler
